servinfo.title: Reassembling Note for Wiring Harness
servinfo.ptxt: Refer to Instrument Panel Harness / Floor Harness (Dash Side Panel)
Refer to Rear End Door Harness

servinfosub.title: Ground Bolt Used on Painted Panels
servinfosub.ptxt: The bolts are specially designed to get good metal-to-metal contact on painted panels.
Be sure to use the specified ground bolt.
Using an ordinary bolt can cause poor grounding on painted panels.

attention2.ptxt: Using this bolt on aluminum blocks will damage the screw hole of the block. Never use this bolt on aluminum blocks.

attention3.ptxt: This ground bolt is not used on the engine block, the transmission case or the steering column mounting bracket (non-painted). Identify the bolt with the paint-scratch shape (1) on the screw.
